name: Upl0ad
description:
UPL0AD is a fun and musical puzzle experience. Sending transmissions through the wires, you can interact with the environment to help our friend F1L3 reach the cloud. Make some noise and collect bits on this whimsical adventure that was built with a MIDI keyboard as a controller.

Newly added is the ability to play on a regular ol' computer keybaord!

If playing with a MIDI keyboard, make sure it's set to -1 octave.

Also, you're going to have to resize the screen to make it portrait friendly. 

Made for Global Game Jam 2018 by Eric Guadara (me) and Alex Nicoletta.
